General.Name: Henan Yicheng New Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Yicheng New Energy Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ultra-high power graphite electrodes and joints in China. The company offers PERC monocrystalline silicon cells, PERC monocrystalline silicon batteries, and lithium-ion battery anode materials, which as are mainly used in various lithium-ion battery fields such as digital power and energy storage. It also provides resin diamond wires and plated diamond wires; operates photovoltaic power stations; and operates sewage and industrial solid waste treatment plants. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kaifeng, China.
General.Address: Fine Chemical Industry Park, Kaifeng, China, 475000
